ai-patthana22.30:0.2_0: under the influence of the Dhamma: the Protector of the Three Worlds
ai-patthana22.30:0.3_0: for the sake of self-developing cloth.
ai-patthana22.30:1.1_0: Not for the sake of non-existence, not for the sake of defilement, dependently origination.
ai-patthana22.30:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana22.30:2.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to satisfaction, nor do he gives rise to the defilement of repulsion.
ai-patthana22.30:2.1_1: the section on the same cause,
ai-patthana22.30:3.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to repulsion for being troubled. Their causes is a condition for the sake of repulsion.
ai-patthana22.30:4.1_0: Not for the sake of non-existence, or for the sake of non-existence, he doesn’t give rise to satisfaction with causes.
ai-patthana22.30:4.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana22.30:5.1_0: Not involveding the state of unconcealedness, nor associated with no floods, this is a condition for the other associated with the nuns.
ai-patthana22.30:5.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana22.30:6.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to repulsion for the sake of not trouble. They’re seeing causes and reasons to give up searching for causes, reasons to get rid of repulsion.
ai-patthana22.30:6.1_1: the section on the same cause,
ai-patthana22.30:7.1_0: Not involved, nor is consciousness of the impingement, or depending on universality, nor gives rise to yet.
ai-patthana22.30:7.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana22.30:8.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to satisfaction or impingement, or for the sake of non-existence, nor repulsion, dependent on repulsion, not a cause or reason.
ai-patthana22.30:8.1_1: the section on the same cause,
ai-patthana22.30:9.1_0: Not involved, nor is consciousness associated with floods, nor does the result of the unspecified pervasion. That is to be associated with cause and reason.
ai-patthana22.30:9.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana22.30:10.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to the unbroken, or associated with the undeclared opposite sex. Because of this, not the cause or condition.
ai-patthana22.30:10.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana22.30:11.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without it.
ai-patthana22.30:12.1_0: One does not give rise to confidence in those without troubles, or difficulty.
ai-patthana22.30:12.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
